**Setup**

RDA/ NaRDA clone Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused SS316 Clapton 2×28 core 38 wrap T/ 450F W/ 35 Wicking/ Japanese cotton Ω/0.25

**Testing**

Steep Time/ 3 days % Used/ 10 PG/VG 0/100 Nic%/ 0

**Mouthfeel** 6/10

Medium body and sweetness with a light caramel sweetness. I would describe it has having a fluffy/cakey density.

**Throat Hit** 1/10

Experienced no throat hit.

**Flavor Properties**

Nice fluffy and slightly moist cake taste with the sweetness having a slight caramel taste to it. The taste is slightly darker/heavier than a real yellow cake.

**Relatable Flavors**

Most similar to the taboo FW Yellow Cake but this also has some similarity in texture and taste to FLV Cupcake Batter. 

**Update**: to get most similar taste and to substitute for FW yellow cake use this at 2-3 times the % called for FW yellow cake in a recipe. Not quite as potent as FW yellow cake but just as good IMO. 

**Off flavors**

While I wouldn’t consider it an “off” flavor it does have a slight caramel taste to it which may just be how I am interpreting the sweetness.

**Position In The Recipe**

Would make an excellent base note for bakeries.

**Pairings**

Creams and fruits. Could see this working well in a parfait recipe or taking the direct replacement at 2-3 times the % called for FW Yellow Cake.

**Recipe**

**Bronuts SANS FW Yellow Cake**

7% CAP Glazed Donut
3-4% ChemNic Yellow Cake
.75% INW Biscuit
.75% FA Joy

**Notes**

I was eager to try this newly released flavor to pt it against the venerable FW Yellow Cake that has yet to have a “safe” replacement. ChemNic recommends 10-15% of this flavor as a standalone so I started with 10%. It can stand on its own at 10% but it is very simple yet still enjoyable as a single flavor. First thing I set off to do with it was subbing it for FW Yellow Cake in my old favorite Bronuts (props to /u/enyawreklaw). The short of it is that this flavor works as a FW Yellow Cake replacement. Comparing original Bronuts to the subbed version I seem to be noticing less of the “waxy” chocolate taste. That you /u/chrisdvr1 for the formatting I borrowed from. I am a complete n00b for flavor notes as you may have noticed from some of my other posts but got to start somewhere I suppose.

**Rating** 95/100

Close enough to replace FW Yellow Cake
